casebody.data:
State
v.
Avenger Ridgeway 375P09-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Avenger Ridgeway, Pro Se.

Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of April 2016 by Defendant for Petition for Moratorium:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
